medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient reports that the pain started yesterday, initially crampy and located in the abdominal area. After moving her bowels three times, the pain became less severe and she was able to sleep. She woke up at 3 AM this morning with severe crampy pain, which then moved to the right lower quadrant and became sharp pain within the next hour. The patient also reports nausea but no vomiting.
medical_history.past_medical_history: c.diff, depression; Previous surgical history includes bilateral wrist surgeries and diagnostic laparoscopy.
